text:
May 25, 1953
The Beacon Press
25 Beacon Street
Boston 8, Massachusetts
Gentlemens
I am delighted with your publication,
"The Jeffersonian Heritage" and I was very pleased
to receive the five copies you sent me.
I will be most curious to learn about
sales by the end of this year.
Sincerely yours.
C. Scott Fletcher
cc - Graydon Ausmus
George Probst
